content: {"name": "SVDP Stone Mountain Family Support Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call in advance for service on these numbers: (404)297-5989, (678) 892-6163 no one will receive call , you need to send voice mail with your number name and situation which shows your zip code, they will call back to make appointment , number can be private or no id you need to receive ", "email": "", "url": "https://svdpgeorgia.org/get-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4871 Memorial Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Stone Mountain", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30083", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7875471, "longitude": -84.23141969999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 292-4102", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call to Register or Leave Voicemail with information."}]}
